title: Chamari to play in the BBL

title: Creeping vaccine hesitancy in Sri Lanka: authorities blame organised campaign
snippet: Sri Lanka's health authorities suspect an organised misinformation campaign is behind an unusual increase in vaccine hesitancy among the country's youth, a health official said. Deputy Health Services Director Dr Hemantha Herath told reporters on Tuesday (28) that a decline has been noted in vaccination of young people owing to misconceptions about side effects of COVID-19 vaccines.
